projects.title: Chess Platform
projects.description: A full-stack chess application using React.js for dynamic frontend interfaces and Node.js for scalable backend services.

projects.title: Messenger
projects.description: Instant Messaging Service like Whatsapp with Audio and Video Calls Functionality.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Implemented and evaluated collaborative filtering and content-based filtering methods using the MovieLens dataset, exploring techniques to enhance recommendation effectiveness.
